values.value: +2 dice for any sorcery, conjuring or enchanting by night.

Owl is a wise and silent watcher. She rarely speaks, but she sees much. Owl rules the night skies, and so what she hunts, she finds. Owl is friendly to her companions, but terrible to her enemies. By day, she is practically helpless.
+2 to all target numbers (even non-magical ones) when in direct sunlight. Even when Owl is sheltered from the sun, add +2 to all target numbers for magic during the daytime.
Any urban or wilderness location, but spell-leamlng is conducted by night
